isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 5000, 9100, 9200, 9400, AND 9900 MODELS - HEATER AND AIR CONDITIONER - DESCRIPTION - Heater-Bunk With Pro Sleeper With Thermostat Temperature Control

svcproc.title: Heater-Bunk With Pro Sleeper With Thermostat Temperature Control
svcproc.para: The bunk heater system provides a blower system in the bunk to circulate heating or cooling air. Off, low, medium or high speed is selectable from the bunk. The thermostat temperature control allows the occupant of the sleeper to select a temperature that the thermostat will then automatically maintain by regulating the HVAC damper door in the heater box under the passenger seat. The system also includes a switch, at the sleeper control panel, for activating the air conditioning compressor.
